name: Dream Defenders (Greenrose7, Zuraniix)
description:
Description

You're the newly appointed Dreamscape Guardian, and as Dreamscape Guardian you must defend young Sam's dreams from all the spooky things that go bump in the night! 

Recruit and fuse units, choose your path carefully, and safeguard Sam's peaceful dreams for another night!

Made for Godot Wild Jam 55!

Controls

Mouse input to click and drag units and click buttons.

Esc: Open Settings Menu

Credits

Game Design and Programming: Lucas Evans 

Art and Graphic Design: Fiona MacKinnon 

Music and Sound: Alex Evans
